nodes.text: Kamu was a male Mahran who was a member of Ashu, a prominent bloodline of Mahran, who lived during the Clone Wars. He was the son of Rakshu, his mother, and the younger brother of Ashu-Nyamal and Teegu. Prior to the attack on Mahranee, he was on his way to becoming an artist. He was killed in space with his family during the mass escape from Mahranee.
